name: Loot Goblins (itch)
description:
A short prototype of a cute, hectic, co-op platformer; with dodge & block mechanics, and 2 boss fights.
Includes pseudo-level and test arena.

I've put this game on hold for the time being.
Till I make the money to continue it, and preferably hire an artist.

Press [T] to Spawn Player 2

Controls
Player 1
Player 2
